alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Custer; Greer; Kiowa; Roger Mills; Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 23 at 10:53AM CDT until June 23 at 11:15AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 AM CDT FOR WASHITA...SOUTHEASTERN ROGER MILLS...SOUTHERN CUSTER... NORTHWESTERN KIOWA...NORTHEASTERN GREER AND EASTERN BECKHAM COUNTIES... At 1052 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles east of Foss Reservoir to 3 miles west of Retrop, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...66 mph wind gust reported at the Butler Mesonet station. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Elk City, Weatherford, Clinton, Sayre, Hobart, Cordell, Granite, Burns Flat, Sentinel, Arapaho, Hammon, Dill City, Canute, Corn, Lone Wolf, Butler, Carter, Bessie, Rocky, and Foss. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Beckham; Custer; Greer; Kiowa; Roger Mills; Washita
